title: Strategies for Improving Multimedia Learning Effectiveness in K-12 Science Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Development of science concept learning methods using VR simulations and animated materials in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners achieve information retention rates of over 80% using multimedia materials (text + audio + animation) that explain scientific concepts
Learners demonstrate transfer task success rates of over 70% by applying scientific concepts acquired in multimedia learning environments to real-world problem-solving scenarios
Learners explain the process of visualizing scientific phenomena through simulations and achieve a comprehension evaluation score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) during peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
